snippet: Despite the bizarre antics of Mayor Rob Ford, most notably his use of crack, he will likely remain at the helm of Canada’s largest city until his term ends next year.
abstract: Toronto Mayor Rob Ford will likely remain at helm of Canada’s largest and most affluent city at least until his term ends in 2014, despite his bizarre antics and use of crack cocaine; Ford's behavior, which has mortified many of his constituents, has also enhanced his appeal with many of his core voters--working-class residents of suburbs; City Council has voted to cut mayor's budget by 60 percent, and have eliminated most of his authority.

byline.original: By JENNIFER STEINHAUER and IAN AUSTEN

lead_paragraph: Despite the bizarre antics of Mayor Rob Ford, most notably his use of crack, he will likely remain at the helm of Canada’s largest city until his term ends next year.

headline.main: His Honor? Toronto’s Mayor Rampages On, to City’s Shame
headline.print_headline: His Honor? Toronto’s Mayor Rampages On, to City’s Shame
